name: Cucumber Hummus Bites
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1/4 cup hummus
recipe: For cucumber hummus bites: Slice cucumber into rounds and top each with a dollop of hummus.

name: Roasted Chickpeas
ingredients: 1 cup cooked chickpeas; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 teaspoon paprika; 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt, to taste
recipe: For roasted chickpeas: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss chickpeas with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

name: Yogurt and Berry Popsicles
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt; 1/2 cup mixed berries; 1 tablespoon honey
recipe: For yogurt and berry popsicles: Blend Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and honey until smooth. Pour into popsicle molds and freeze until set.

name: Cottage Cheese Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
recipe: For cottage cheese stuffed bell peppers: Slice bell peppers in half and remove seeds. Fill each half with low-fat cottage cheese and sprinkle with black pepper.

name: Almond Butter Banana Bites
ingredients: 1 banana; 2 tablespoons almond butter
recipe: For almond butter banana bites: Slice banana into rounds and spread each with almond butter.

name: Veggie Sticks with Hummus
ingredients: 1 carrot; 1 cucumber; 1/4 cup hummus
recipe: For veggie sticks with hummus: Cut carrot and cucumber into sticks and serve with hummus for dipping.

name: Greek Yogurt with Granola
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt; 1/4 cup granola
recipe: For Greek yogurt with granola: Top Greek yogurt with granola for a crunchy and protein-rich snack.

name: Fruit and Nut Trail Mix
ingredients: 1/4 cup almonds; 1/4 cup walnuts; 1/4 cup dried cranberries; 1/4 cup dried apricots
recipe: For fruit and nut trail mix: Mix almonds, walnuts, dried cranberries, and dried apricots together for a satisfying snack on the go.

name: Whole Grain Crackers with Avocado
ingredients: 4 whole grain crackers; 1/2 avocado
recipe: For whole grain crackers with avocado: Spread mashed avocado onto whole grain crackers for a fiber-rich snack.

name: Egg Salad Cucumber Boats
ingredients: 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon finely chopped celery; Salt and pepper, to taste; 2 small cucumbers
recipe: For egg salad cucumber boats: Cut cucumbers in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds. In a bowl, mix chopped hard-boiled eggs, Greek yogurt, celery, salt, and pepper. Fill each cucumber half with the egg salad mixture.

name: Green Apple Slices with Peanut Butter
ingredients: 1 medium green apple, sliced; 2 tablespoons peanut butter
recipe: For green apple slices with peanut butter: Spread peanut butter onto green apple slices for a satisfying and crunchy snack.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 6 large mushrooms; 1 cup spinach, chopped; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; 1 tablespoon olive oil; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For spinach and feta stuffed mushrooms: Remove stems from mushrooms and set aside. In a skillet, sauté chopped spinach with olive oil until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. Stuff mushrooms with sautéed spinach and crumbled feta cheese. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes until mushrooms are tender.

name: Cherry Tomato and Mozzarella Skewers
ingredients: 12 cherry tomatoes; 12 small mozzarella balls; Fresh basil leaves; Balsamic glaze
recipe: For cherry tomato and mozzarella skewers: Thread cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and fresh basil leaves onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Carrot Cake Energy Bites
ingredients: 1 cup shredded carrots; 1/2 cup rolled oats; 1/4 cup almond butter; 2 tablespoons honey; 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon; 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract; Unsweetened shredded coconut, for rolling
recipe: For carrot cake energy bites: In a food processor, blend shredded carrots, rolled oats, almond butter, honey, cinnamon, and vanilla extract until well combined. Roll mixture into small balls and coat with shredded coconut.

name: Chickpea Salad Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1 cup cooked chickpeas; 1/4 cup diced bell peppers; 1/4 cup diced cucumbers; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste; Lettuce leaves
recipe: For chickpea salad lettuce wraps: In a bowl, mix cooked chickpeas, diced bell peppers, cucumbers, tomatoes, chopped fresh parsley, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spoon chickpea salad onto lettuce leaves and wrap to serve.

name: Berry and Almond Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 1/4 cup mixed berries; 2 tablespoons sliced almonds; 1 tablespoon honey
recipe: For berry and almond yogurt parfait: Layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, sliced almonds, and honey in a glass to create a parfait.

name: Stuffed Mini Bell Peppers
ingredients: 6 mini bell peppers; 1/2 cup cottage cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For stuffed mini bell peppers: Slice mini bell peppers in half lengthwise and remove seeds. In a bowl, mix cottage cheese, chopped fresh chives, salt, and pepper. Fill each pepper half with the cottage cheese mixture.

name: Mango Salsa with Baked Tortilla Chips
ingredients: 1 ripe mango, diced; 1/4 cup diced red onion; 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro; 1 jalapeño, seeded and minced; 1 tablespoon lime juice; Salt, to taste; Whole grain tortillas
recipe: For mango salsa with baked tortilla chips: In a bowl, combine diced mango, diced red onion, chopped fresh cilantro, minced jalapeño, lime juice, and salt to make salsa. Cut whole grain tortillas into triangles, place on a baking sheet, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10-12 minutes until crispy. Serve mango salsa with baked tortilla chips.

name: Quinoa Salad Stuffed Cucumber Cups
ingredients: 1 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup diced bell peppers; 1/4 cup diced cucumber; 1/4 cup halved cherry tomatoes; 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste; Cucumber cups
recipe: For quinoa salad stuffed cucumber cups: In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, diced bell peppers, diced cucumber, halved cherry tomatoes, chopped fresh parsley, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Fill cucumber cups with quinoa salad to serve.

name: Turkey and Veggie Skewers
ingredients: 8 oz turkey breast, cubed; 1 zucchini, sliced; 1 yellow bell pepper, cubed; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For turkey and veggie skewers: Thread cubed turkey breast, sliced zucchini, and cubed yellow bell pepper onto skewers. Brush with olive oil and sprinkle with Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper. Grill or bake until turkey is cooked through and vegetables are tender.

name: Whole Grain Pita Chips with Guacamole
ingredients: 2 whole grain pitas; 1 ripe avocado; 1 tablespoon lime juice; 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For whole grain pita chips with guacamole: Cut whole grain pitas into triangles, place on a baking sheet, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10-12 minutes until crispy. Mash ripe avocado with lime juice, garlic powder, salt, and pepper to make guacamole. Serve whole grain pita chips with guacamole for dipping.

name: Cottage Cheese and Pineapple Skewers
ingredients: 1 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 1 cup pineapple chunks
recipe: For cottage cheese and pineapple skewers: Thread low-fat cottage cheese and pineapple chunks onto skewers for a sweet and protein-rich snack.

name: Eggplant Chips with Yogurt Dip
ingredients: 1 small eggplant, thinly sliced; 2 tablespoons olive oil; 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika; 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt and pepper, to taste; 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill
recipe: For eggplant chips with yogurt dip: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss thinly sliced eggplant with olive oil, smoked paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes until crisp. Mix Greek yogurt with chopped fresh dill to make dip. Serve eggplant chips with yogurt dip.

name: Bell Pepper Nachos
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup cooked black beans; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
recipe: For bell pepper nachos: Slice bell peppers into rings and arrange on a baking sheet. Top each bell pepper ring with black beans, diced tomatoes, and shredded cheddar cheese. Broil in the oven until cheese is melted. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro before serving.

name: Tuna Cucumber Boats
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1 can tuna, drained; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For tuna cucumber boats: Cut cucumber in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds. In a bowl, mix drained tuna, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Fill each cucumber half with the tuna mixture.

name: Zucchini Chips with Parmesan
ingredients: 2 medium zucchinis; 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For zucchini chips with Parmesan: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). Slice zucchinis into thin rounds and place on a baking sheet. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Bake for 15-20 minutes until crispy.

name: Cauliflower Buffalo Bites
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, cut into florets; 1/4 cup buffalo sauce; 2 tablespoons olive oil; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For cauliflower buffalo bites: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C). Toss cauliflower florets with buffalo sauce, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

name: Broccoli Cheese Bites
ingredients: 2 cups chopped broccoli florets; 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese; 1 egg; 1/4 cup breadcrumbs
recipe: For broccoli cheese bites: Steam chopped broccoli florets until tender. In a bowl, mix steamed broccoli with shredded cheddar cheese, grated Parmesan cheese, egg, and breadcrumbs. Form mixture into small patties and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.

name: Apple Sandwiches with Almond Butter
ingredients: 1 apple, sliced; 2 tablespoons almond butter; 2 tablespoons granola
recipe: For apple sandwiches with almond butter: Spread almond butter between apple slices and sprinkle with granola for a crunchy and satisfying snack.

name: Chia Seed Pudding with Berries
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chia seeds; 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk; 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract; 1 tablespoon honey; 1/2 cup mixed berries
recipe: For chia seed pudding with berries: Mix chia seeds with unsweetened almond milk, vanilla extract, and honey. Let it sit for at least 30 minutes or overnight in the refrigerator until thickened. Top with mixed berries before serving.

name: Stuffed Celery Sticks
ingredients: 4 celery stalks; 1/4 cup peanut butter; 1/4 cup raisins
recipe: For stuffed celery sticks: Fill celery stalks with peanut butter and top with raisins for a sweet and crunchy snack.

name: Avocado Egg Salad Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped; 1 avocado, mashed; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste; Lettuce leaves
recipe: For avocado egg salad lettuce wraps: In a bowl, mix chopped hard-boiled eggs, mashed avocado, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spoon egg salad onto lettuce leaves and wrap to serve.

name: Cucumber Rolls with Tuna Salad
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1 can tuna, drained; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For cucumber rolls with tuna salad: Slice cucumber lengthwise into thin strips using a peeler. In a bowl, mix drained tuna, Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper. Spread tuna salad onto cucumber strips and roll up.

name: Greek Yogurt Bark with Berries
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon honey; 1/2 cup mixed berries
recipe: For Greek yogurt bark with berries: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Mix Greek yogurt with honey and spread onto the prepared baking sheet. Sprinkle mixed berries on top and freeze for at least 2 hours until firm. Break into pieces before serving.

name: Cottage Cheese Stuffed Dates
ingredients: 6 Medjool dates, pitted; 1/2 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped pistachios
recipe: For cottage cheese stuffed dates: Fill pitted Medjool dates with low-fat cottage cheese and sprinkle with chopped pistachios for a sweet and protein-packed snack.

name: Chickpea and Veggie Quesadillas
ingredients: 1 cup cooked chickpeas; 1/4 cup diced bell peppers; 1/4 cup diced onions; 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 2 whole grain tortillas
recipe: For chickpea and veggie quesadillas: Mash cooked chickpeas and spread onto one whole grain tortilla. Top with diced bell peppers, diced onions, and shredded cheddar cheese. Place another tortilla on top and grill in a pan until cheese is melted and tortillas are crispy.

name: Roasted Beet Chips
ingredients: 2 medium beets; 1 tablespoon olive oil; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For roasted beet chips: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Peel and thinly slice beets. Toss beet slices with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

name: Cucumber Sushi Rolls
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1/4 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup shredded carrots; 1/4 cup sliced avocado; 1 tablespoon rice vinegar; 1/2 teaspoon sesame seeds
recipe: For cucumber sushi rolls: Slice cucumber lengthwise into thin strips using a peeler. Lay cucumber strips flat and spread cooked quinoa, shredded carrots, and sliced avocado evenly. Sprinkle with rice vinegar and sesame seeds, then roll up tightly.

name: Pistachio Yogurt Dip with Apple Slices
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 2 tablespoons chopped pistachios; 1 tablespoon honey; 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract; 1 apple, sliced
recipe: For pistachio yogurt dip with apple slices: Mix Greek yogurt, chopped pistachios, honey, and vanilla extract. Serve with apple slices for dipping.

name: Cherry Tomato Basil Skewers
ingredients: 12 cherry tomatoes; 12 fresh basil leaves; Balsamic glaze
recipe: For cherry tomato basil skewers: Thread cherry tomatoes and fresh basil leaves onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Spicy Roasted Chickpeas
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 teaspoon smoked paprika; 1/2 teaspoon cumin; 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper; Salt, to taste
recipe: For spicy roasted chickpeas: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Pat chickpeas dry with a paper towel and toss with olive oil, smoked paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 25-30 minutes until crispy.

name: Mango Coconut Chia Pudding
ingredients: 1/4 cup chia seeds; 1 cup unsweetened coconut milk; 1/2 cup diced mango; 2 tablespoons shredded coconut
recipe: For mango coconut chia pudding: Mix chia seeds and coconut milk. Let it sit for at least 30 minutes or overnight in the refrigerator until thickened. Top with diced mango and shredded coconut before serving.

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
ingredients: 12 grape leaves; 1/2 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley; 2 tablespoons lemon juice; 1 tablespoon olive oil; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For stuffed grape leaves: Blanch grape leaves in boiling water for 2 minutes, then drain and pat dry. In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, diced tomatoes, chopped fresh parsley, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Place a spoonful of quinoa mixture on each grape leaf and roll up tightly.

name: Carrot Cake Energy Balls
ingredients: 1 cup shredded carrots; 1/2 cup rolled oats; 1/4 cup almond butter; 2 tablespoons honey; 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon; 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg; 1/4 cup shredded coconut
recipe: For carrot cake energy balls: Blend shredded carrots, rolled oats, almond butter, honey, cinnamon, and nutmeg until well combined. Roll mixture into balls and coat with shredded coconut.

name: Tuna Salad Cucumber Bites
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1 can tuna, drained; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For tuna salad cucumber bites: Slice cucumber into rounds and hollow out the center to create cucumber cups. In a bowl, mix drained tuna, Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper. Spoon tuna salad into cucumber cups.

name: Almond Flour Banana Muffins
ingredients: 1 cup almond flour; 1/2 teaspoon baking powder; 1/4 teaspoon baking soda; 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon; Pinch of salt; 2 ripe bananas, mashed; 1 egg; 1 tablespoon honey; 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipe: For almond flour banana muffins: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). In a bowl, mix almond flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt. In another bowl, mix mashed bananas, egg, honey, and vanilla extract. Combine wet and dry ingredients until well mixed. Spoon batter into muffin cups and bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.

name: Bell Pepper Hummus Cups
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup hummus; 2 tablespoons chopped parsley
recipe: For bell pepper hummus cups: Cut bell peppers into rings and remove seeds. Fill each bell pepper ring with hummus and sprinkle with chopped parsley.

name: Cucumber Avocado Rolls
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1/2 avocado, mashed; 1/4 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup diced red bell pepper; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For cucumber avocado rolls: Slice cucumber lengthwise into thin strips using a peeler. Spread mashed avocado onto cucumber strips, then top with cooked quinoa, diced red bell pepper, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Roll up tightly and secure with toothpicks.

name: Turmeric Roasted Almonds
ingredients: 1 cup raw almonds; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 teaspoon turmeric; 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder; 1/2 teaspoon cumin; Salt, to taste
recipe: For turmeric roasted almonds: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C). Toss raw almonds with olive oil, turmeric, garlic powder, cumin, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 8 large mushrooms; 1 cup chopped spinach; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; 1/4 cup breadcrumbs; 1 clove garlic, minced; 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe: For spinach and feta stuffed mushrooms: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Remove stems from mushrooms and place caps on a baking sheet. In a skillet, sauté chopped spinach and minced garlic in olive oil until wilted. Remove from heat and stir in crumbled feta cheese and breadcrumbs. Spoon filling into mushroom caps and bake for 15-20 minutes until mushrooms are tender.

name: Cauliflower Tots
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, grated; 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese; 1/4 cup breadcrumbs; 1 egg; 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For cauliflower tots: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Mix grated cauliflower, Parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, egg, garlic powder, salt, and pepper until well combined. Form mixture into tots and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.

name: Minty Yogurt Dip with Veggie Sticks
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste; Assorted veggie sticks
recipe: For minty yogurt dip with veggie sticks: Mix Greek yogurt, chopped fresh mint, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Serve with assorted veggie sticks for dipping.

name: Apple Cinnamon Rice Cakes
ingredients: 2 rice cakes; 2 tablespoons almond butter; 1/2 apple, thinly sliced; 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon
recipe: For apple cinnamon rice cakes: Spread almond butter on rice cakes and top with thinly sliced apple. Sprinkle with cinnamon before serving.

name: Chickpea Salad Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup diced cucumber; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 2 tablespoons chopped parsley; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste; Lettuce leaves
recipe: For chickpea salad lettuce wraps: Mash chickpeas in a bowl and mix with diced cucumber, diced tomatoes, chopped parsley, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spoon chickpea salad onto lettuce leaves and wrap to serve.

name: Cinnamon Roasted Carrot Sticks
ingredients: 4 carrots, cut into sticks; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon; 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg; Salt, to taste
recipe: For cinnamon roasted carrot sticks: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss carrot sticks with olive oil, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and roast for 20-25 minutes until tender.

name: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup black beans, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro
recipe: For quinoa stuffed bell peppers: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Cut bell peppers in half lengthwise and remove seeds. In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, black beans, diced tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese, and chopped cilantro. Fill bell pepper halves with quinoa mixture and bake for 20-25 minutes until peppers are tender.

name: Sesame Garlic Edamame
ingredients: 2 cups edamame, steamed; 1 tablespoon sesame oil; 1 clove garlic, minced; 1 tablespoon soy sauce; 1 tablespoon sesame seeds
recipe: For sesame garlic edamame: Heat sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. Add steamed edamame, soy sauce, and sesame seeds. Cook for another 2-3 minutes until edamame is coated in sauce.

name: Pita Chips with Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
ingredients: 2 whole wheat pitas; 1/4 cup olive oil; 1 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt and pepper, to taste; 1/2 cup roasted red pepper hummus
recipe: For pita chips with roasted red pepper hummus: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Cut pitas into wedges and place on a baking sheet. In a small bowl, mix olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Brush pitas with oil mixture and bake for 10-12 minutes until crispy. Serve with roasted red pepper hummus for dipping.

name: Yogurt Berry Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 1/4 cup mixed berries; 2 tablespoons granola
recipe: For yogurt berry parfait: Layer Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and granola in a glass or bowl. Repeat layers as desired.

name: Spinach Artichoke Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 8 large mushrooms; 1 cup chopped spinach; 1/2 cup chopped artichoke hearts; 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese; 1/4 cup breadcrumbs; 1 clove garlic, minced; 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe: For spinach artichoke stuffed mushrooms: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Remove stems from mushrooms and place caps on a baking sheet. In a skillet, sauté chopped spinach, chopped artichoke hearts, minced garlic, and olive oil until spinach is wilted. Remove from heat and stir in grated Parmesan cheese and breadcrumbs. Spoon filling into mushroom caps and bake for 15-20 minutes until mushrooms are tender.

name: Banana Peanut Butter Bites
ingredients: 2 bananas, sliced; 1/4 cup peanut butter; 2 tablespoons dark chocolate chips
recipe: For banana peanut butter bites: Spread peanut butter on banana slices and top with dark chocolate chips for a sweet and satisfying snack.

name: Tomato Basil Mozzarella Skewers
ingredients: 12 cherry tomatoes; 12 fresh basil leaves; 12 small mozzarella balls; Balsamic glaze
recipe: For tomato basil mozzarella skewers: Thread cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves, and mozzarella balls onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Coconut Date Energy Balls
ingredients: 1 cup pitted dates; 1/2 cup rolled oats; 1/4 cup shredded coconut; 1/4 cup almonds; 1 tablespoon coconut oil; 1 tablespoon cocoa powder
recipe: For coconut date energy balls: Blend pitted dates, rolled oats, shredded coconut, almonds, coconut oil, and cocoa powder until mixture comes together. Roll into balls and refrigerate until firm.

name: Stuffed Bell Pepper Rings
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup black beans, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
recipe: For stuffed bell pepper rings: Slice bell peppers into rings and remove seeds. In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, black beans, diced tomatoes, shredded cheddar cheese, and chopped cilantro. Fill bell pepper rings with quinoa mixture and bake for 20-25 minutes until peppers are tender.

name: Broccoli Tots
ingredients: 1 head broccoli, grated; 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese; 1/4 cup breadcrumbs; 1 egg; 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For broccoli tots: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Mix grated broccoli, Parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs, egg, garlic powder, salt, and pepper until well combined. Form mixture into tots and place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown.

name: Mango Salsa with Baked Tortilla Chips
ingredients: 1 mango, diced; 1/2 red onion, finely chopped; 1/4 cup chopped cilantro; 1 jalapeño, seeded and minced; Juice of 1 lime; Salt and pepper, to taste; 2 whole wheat tortillas
recipe: For mango salsa with baked tortilla chips: In a bowl, combine diced mango, chopped red onion, chopped cilantro, minced jalapeño, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix well. Cut tortillas into wedges and place on a baking sheet. Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 10-12 minutes until crispy. Serve with mango salsa.

name: Greek Yogurt Veggie Dip
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 1/4 cup chopped cucumber; 1/4 cup chopped bell peppers; 1/4 cup grated carrots; 1 tablespoon chopped fresh dill; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For Greek yogurt veggie dip: Mix Greek yogurt, chopped cucumber, chopped bell peppers, grated carrots, chopped fresh dill, salt, and pepper. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before serving.

name: Chocolate Covered Strawberries
ingredients: 6 strawberries; 2 oz dark chocolate, melted
recipe: For chocolate-covered strawberries: Dip strawberries into melted dark chocolate and place on a parchment-lined baking sheet. Chill in the refrigerator until chocolate is set.

name: Chia Seed Pudding with Berries
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chia seeds; 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk; 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract; 1/2 cup mixed berries
recipe: For chia seed pudding with berries: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, and vanilla extract in a bowl. Let it sit in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight until thickened. Serve with mixed berries on top.

name: Cottage Cheese Stuffed Celery
ingredients: 4 celery stalks; 1/2 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 1/4 teaspoon paprika
recipe: For cottage cheese stuffed celery: Fill celery stalks with low-fat cottage cheese and sprinkle with paprika for added flavor.

name: Watermelon Feta Salad Skewers
ingredients: 2 cups cubed watermelon; 1/2 cup crumbled feta cheese; Fresh mint leaves
recipe: For watermelon feta salad skewers: Thread cubed watermelon and crumbled feta cheese onto skewers. Garnish with fresh mint leaves.

name: Carrot Cake Oatmeal Cookies
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats; 1/2 cup grated carrots; 1/4 cup chopped walnuts; 1/4 cup raisins; 2 tablespoons honey; 1 egg
recipe: For carrot cake oatmeal cookies: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). In a bowl, mix rolled oats, grated carrots, chopped walnuts, raisins, honey, and egg until well combined. Drop spoonfuls of the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown.

name: Bell Pepper Nachos
ingredients: 2 bell peppers, halved and seeded; 1/2 cup black beans, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
recipe: For bell pepper nachos: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). Place bell pepper halves on a baking sheet. Fill each half with black beans, diced tomatoes, and shredded cheddar cheese. Bake for 10-12 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. Sprinkle with chopped cilantro before serving.

name: Pumpkin Spice Energy Balls
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats; 1/2 cup pumpkin puree; 1/4 cup almond butter; 2 tablespoons maple syrup; 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice
recipe: For pumpkin spice energy balls: Mix rolled oats, pumpkin puree, almond butter, maple syrup, and pumpkin pie spice until well combined. Roll into balls and refrigerate until firm.

name: Cucumber Feta Bites
ingredients: 1 cucumber, sliced; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; 2 tablespoons balsamic glaze
recipe: For cucumber feta bites: Top cucumber slices with crumbled feta cheese and drizzle with balsamic glaze for a refreshing snack.

name: Almond Butter Banana Toast
ingredients: 2 slices whole wheat bread; 2 tablespoons almond butter; 1 banana, sliced
recipe: For almond butter banana toast: Toast whole wheat bread and spread with almond butter. Top with sliced banana for a simple yet satisfying snack.

name: Zucchini Pizza Bites
ingredients: 2 small zucchinis, sliced into rounds; 1/4 cup marinara sauce; 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese; 1 teaspoon Italian seasoning
recipe: For zucchini pizza bites: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Place zucchini rounds on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Top each round with marinara sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, and Italian seasoning. Bake for 10-12 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.

name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 1 cup mixed berries; 1/2 banana, frozen; 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 2 tablespoons granola
recipe: For berry smoothie bowl: Blend mixed berries, frozen banana, almond milk, and Greek yogurt until smooth. Pour into a bowl and top with granola for added crunch.

name: Spicy Roasted Chickpeas
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, drained and rinsed; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1 teaspoon paprika; 1/2 teaspoon cumin; 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper; Salt, to taste
recipe: For spicy roasted chickpeas: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Pat chickpeas dry with a paper towel and toss with olive oil, paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and roast for 25-30 minutes until crispy.

name: Cucumber Roll-Ups
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1/4 cup low-fat cream cheese; 1/4 cup shredded carrots; 1/4 cup chopped bell peppers; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For cucumber roll-ups: Slice cucumber lengthwise into thin strips. Spread low-fat cream cheese on each strip, sprinkle with shredded carrots and chopped bell peppers. Season with salt and pepper, then roll up the cucumber strips.

name: Rice Cake with Cottage Cheese and Berries
ingredients: 1 rice cake; 1/4 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 1/4 cup mixed berries
recipe: For rice cake with cottage cheese and berries: Spread low-fat cottage cheese on a rice cake and top with mixed berries.

name: Stuffed Cherry Tomatoes
ingredients: 12 cherry tomatoes; 1/4 cup hummus; 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley
recipe: For stuffed cherry tomatoes: Cut a small slice off the top of each cherry tomato and scoop out the seeds. Fill each tomato with hummus and sprinkle with chopped fresh parsley.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait with Granola
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 1/4 cup granola; 1/4 cup mixed berries
recipe: For Greek yogurt parfait with granola: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries in a glass or bowl. Repeat layers as desired.

name: Roasted Red Pepper and Feta Dip with Veggie Sticks
ingredients: 1 roasted red pepper, chopped; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Assorted veggie sticks
recipe: For roasted red pepper and feta dip with veggie sticks: Blend chopped roasted red pepper, crumbled feta cheese, Greek yogurt, and lemon juice until smooth. Serve with assorted veggie sticks for dipping.

name: Apple Slices with Almond Butter
ingredients: 1 apple, sliced; 2 tablespoons almond butter
recipe: For apple slices with almond butter: Dip apple slices in almond butter for a satisfying and nutritious snack.

name: Spicy Avocado Cucumber Bites
ingredients: 1 cucumber, sliced; 1/2 avocado, mashed; 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For spicy avocado cucumber bites: Spread mashed avocado on cucumber slices. Sprinkle with red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper.

name: Mixed Nuts and Dried Fruit
ingredients: 1/4 cup mixed nuts (almonds, walnuts, cashews); 1/4 cup dried fruit (raisins, cranberries, apricots)
recipe: For mixed nuts and dried fruit: Mix together a variety of mixed nuts and dried fruit for a nutritious and portable snack.

name: Cottage Cheese and Pineapple Boat
ingredients: 1/2 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 1/2 cup diced pineapple
recipe: For cottage cheese and pineapple boat: Serve diced pineapple in a hollowed-out pineapple boat, topped with low-fat cottage cheese.

name: Turkey and Cucumber Roll-Ups
ingredients: 4 slices turkey breast; 1 cucumber, sliced lengthwise; 1/4 cup hummus
recipe: For turkey and cucumber roll-ups: Spread hummus on turkey breast slices and place cucumber slices on top. Roll up and secure with toothpicks.

name: Cherry Almond Energy Bites
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats; 1/4 cup almond butter; 1/4 cup dried cherries; 2 tablespoons honey; 1/4 cup sliced almonds
recipe: For cherry almond energy bites: Mix rolled oats, almond butter, dried cherries, honey, and sliced almonds until well combined. Roll into balls and refrigerate until firm.

name: Yogurt-Covered Blueberries
ingredients: 1/2 cup blueberries; 1/4 cup Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon honey
recipe: For yogurt-covered blueberries: Dip blueberries in Greek yogurt mixed with honey, then place on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Freeze until yogurt is set.

name: Avocado and Tomato Toast
ingredients: 1 slice whole grain bread; 1/4 avocado, mashed; 1/2 tomato, sliced; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For avocado and tomato toast: Toast the whole grain bread, spread mashed avocado on top, and layer with sliced tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Chickpea Salad
ingredients: 1 cup canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup diced cucumber; 1/4 cup diced bell pepper; 2 tablespoons chopped parsley; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe: For chickpea salad: Mix canned chickpeas, diced cucumber, diced bell pepper, chopped parsley, lemon juice, and olive oil together in a bowl. Serve chilled.

name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 6 large mushrooms; 1 cup spinach, chopped; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; 1 clove garlic, minced
recipe: For spinach and feta stuffed mushrooms: Remove the stems from the mushrooms and spoon out the gills. In a pan, sauté chopped spinach and minced garlic until wilted. Fill each mushroom cap with the spinach mixture and top with crumbled feta cheese. Bake in the oven at 375°F (190°C) for 15 minutes.

name: Hummus and Veggie Wraps
ingredients: 1 whole wheat tortilla; 1/4 cup hummus; 1/2 cup mixed veggies (carrots, bell peppers, cucumbers), julienned
recipe: For hummus and veggie wraps: Spread hummus onto a whole wheat tortilla, place julienned mixed veggies on top, and roll up tightly. Slice into bite-sized pieces.

name: Quinoa Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup black beans, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup corn kernels; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
recipe: For quinoa stuffed bell peppers: Cut the bell peppers in half lengthwise and remove the seeds. In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, black beans, corn kernels, diced tomatoes, and chopped cilantro. Fill each bell pepper half with the quinoa mixture and bake in the oven at 375°F (190°C) for 20-25 minutes.

name: Egg Salad Cucumber Boats
ingredients: 2 cucumbers; 2 hard-boiled eggs, chopped; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For egg salad cucumber boats: Cut the cucumbers in half lengthwise and scoop out the seeds to form boats. In a bowl, mix chopped hard-boiled eggs, Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper. Fill each cucumber boat with the egg salad mixture.

name: Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
ingredients: 1 cup mixed fruits (strawberries, blueberries, kiwi, grapes); 1 tablespoon honey; Juice of 1 lime
recipe: For fruit salad with honey-lime dressing: Combine mixed fruits in a bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk together honey and lime juice. Drizzle the dressing over the fruit salad and toss gently to coat.

name: Mango Coconut Energy Balls
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats; 1/2 cup dried mango, chopped; 1/4 cup shredded coconut; 2 tablespoons honey; 1 tablespoon coconut oil
recipe: For mango coconut energy balls: In a food processor, combine rolled oats, dried mango, shredded coconut, honey, and coconut oil. Pulse until the mixture comes together. Roll into balls and refrigerate until firm.

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
ingredients: 12 grape leaves; 1/2 cup cooked quinoa; 1/4 cup chickpeas, mashed; 2 tablespoons chopped mint; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For stuffed grape leaves: Blanch grape leaves in boiling water for 2 minutes, then remove and drain. In a bowl, mix cooked quinoa, mashed chickpeas, chopped mint, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Place a spoonful of the quinoa mixture in the center of each grape leaf, then fold the sides over and roll up tightly.

name: Greek Yogurt Berry Popsicles
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt; 1/2 cup mixed berries; 2 tablespoons honey
recipe: For Greek yogurt berry popsicles: Blend Greek yogurt, mixed berries, and honey until smooth. Pour the mixture into popsicle molds and insert sticks. Freeze for at least 4 hours until set.

name: Cucumber Hummus Bites
ingredients: 1 cucumber, sliced; 1/4 cup hummus; Paprika
recipe: For cucumber hummus bites: Top cucumber slices with hummus and sprinkle with paprika for extra flavor.

name: Coconut Chia Pudding
ingredients: 1/4 cup chia seeds; 1 cup coconut milk; 1 tablespoon maple syrup; 1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
recipe: For coconut chia pudding: Mix chia seeds, coconut milk, maple syrup, and vanilla extract in a bowl. Let it sit in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight until thickened.

name: Almond Stuffed Dates
ingredients: 6 dates, pitted; 12 whole almonds
recipe: For almond stuffed dates: Gently open each date and insert a whole almond. Serve as a quick and satisfying snack.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Bites
ingredients: 1 banana, sliced; 2 tablespoons peanut butter
recipe: For peanut butter banana bites: Spread peanut butter onto banana slices for a delicious and protein-packed snack.

name: Zucchini Chips
ingredients: 1 medium zucchini, sliced; 1 tablespoon olive oil; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For zucchini chips: Toss zucchini slices with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

name: Cottage Cheese Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped chives
recipe: For cottage cheese stuffed bell peppers: Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds. Fill each pepper with low-fat cottage cheese and sprinkle with chopped chives.

name: Chia Seed Pudding with Berries
ingredients: 1/4 cup chia seeds; 1 cup almond milk; 1 tablespoon honey; 1/2 cup mixed berries
recipe: For chia seed pudding with berries: Mix chia seeds, almond milk, and honey in a bowl. Let it sit in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours or overnight until thickened. Serve topped with mixed berries.

name: Roasted Beet Chips
ingredients: 2 medium beets, thinly sliced; 1 tablespoon olive oil; Salt, to taste
recipe: For roasted beet chips: Toss beet slices with olive oil and salt. Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

name: Turkey Cucumber Roll-Ups
ingredients: 4 slices turkey breast; 1 cucumber, sliced lengthwise; 1/4 cup hummus
recipe: For turkey cucumber roll-ups: Spread hummus on turkey breast slices and place cucumber slices on top. Roll up tightly and slice into bite-sized pieces.

name: Greek Yogurt Dip with Veggie Sticks
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; 1/2 teaspoon dried dill; Assorted veggie sticks
recipe: For Greek yogurt dip with veggie sticks: Mix Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and dried dill until well combined. Serve with assorted veggie sticks for dipping.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms with Spinach and Feta
ingredients: 6 large mushrooms; 1 cup chopped spinach; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; 1 clove garlic, minced
recipe: For stuffed mushrooms with spinach and feta: Remove the stems from the mushrooms and chop them. In a pan, sauté chopped mushroom stems, chopped spinach, and minced garlic until spinach is wilted. Fill each mushroom cap with the spinach mixture and top with crumbled feta cheese. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15 minutes.

name: Chickpea and Veggie Salad
ingredients: 1 cup canned chickpeas, drained and rinsed; 1/2 cup diced cucumber; 1/2 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup diced red onion; 2 tablespoons chopped parsley; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; 1 tablespoon olive oil
recipe: For chickpea and veggie salad: Mix canned chickpeas, diced cucumber, diced tomatoes, diced red onion, chopped parsley, lemon juice, and olive oil in a bowl. Serve chilled.

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1 ripe banana; 2 tablespoons peanut butter; 1 cup almond milk; 1/2 cup ice cubes
recipe: For peanut butter banana smoothie: Blend ripe banana, peanut butter, almond milk, and ice cubes until smooth and creamy.

name: Veggie Sushi Rolls
ingredients: 2 nori sheets; 1/2 cup cooked sushi rice; 1/4 cup sliced cucumber; 1/4 cup sliced avocado; 1/4 cup shredded carrots; Soy sauce, for dipping
recipe: For veggie sushi rolls: Place a nori sheet on a bamboo sushi mat. Spread cooked sushi rice evenly over the nori sheet, leaving a 1-inch border at the top. Arrange sliced cucumber, sliced avocado, and shredded carrots in the center of the rice. Roll up tightly using the bamboo mat. Slice into bite-sized pieces and serve with soy sauce for dipping.

name: Coconut Yogurt with Mango
ingredients: 1/2 cup coconut yogurt; 1/2 cup diced mango
recipe: For coconut yogurt with mango: Serve diced mango over coconut yogurt for a tropical and refreshing snack.

name: Stuffed Celery with Cream Cheese
ingredients: 4 celery stalks; 1/4 cup low-fat cream cheese; 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts
recipe: For stuffed celery with cream cheese: Fill celery stalks with low-fat cream cheese and sprinkle with chopped walnuts for added crunch.

name: Cucumber Avocado Rolls
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1/2 avocado, sliced; 1/4 cup alfalfa sprouts
recipe: For cucumber avocado rolls: Use a vegetable peeler to slice thin strips of cucumber lengthwise. Place avocado slices and alfalfa sprouts on each cucumber strip, then roll up tightly.

name: Spicy Roasted Edamame
ingredients: 1 cup edamame, shelled; 1 teaspoon olive oil; 1/2 teaspoon chili powder; 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder; Salt, to taste
recipe: For spicy roasted edamame: Toss shelled edamame with olive oil, chili powder, garlic powder, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and roast at 400°F (200°C) for 15-20 minutes until crispy.

name: Cauliflower Popcorn
ingredients: 2 cups cauliflower florets; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1/2 teaspoon smoked paprika; 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder
recipe: For cauliflower popcorn: Toss cauliflower florets with olive oil, smoked paprika, and garlic powder. Roast in the oven at 425°F (220°C) for 20-25 minutes until golden brown and crispy.

name: Bell Pepper Nachos
ingredients: 2 bell peppers, sliced; 1/2 cup black beans, drained and rinsed; 1/4 cup shredded cheese; 1/4 cup salsa; 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
recipe: For bell pepper nachos: Arrange bell pepper slices on a baking sheet. Top with black beans and shredded cheese. Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 10-12 minutes until cheese is melted. Top with salsa and chopped cilantro before serving.

name: Cucumber Sushi Rolls
ingredients: 1 cucumber; 1/2 cup cooked sushi rice; 1/4 cup shredded carrots; 1/4 cup sliced avocado; Soy sauce, for dipping
recipe: For cucumber sushi rolls: Use a vegetable peeler to slice thin strips of cucumber lengthwise. Spread cooked sushi rice evenly over the cucumber strips. Arrange shredded carrots and sliced avocado on top. Roll up tightly and slice into bite-sized pieces. Serve with soy sauce for dipping.

name: Apple Peanut Butter Sandwiches
ingredients: 1 apple, sliced; 2 tablespoons peanut butter; Granola
recipe: For apple peanut butter sandwiches: Spread peanut butter between apple slices and sprinkle with granola for added crunch.

name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
ingredients: 1/2 cup Greek yogurt; 1/4 cup granola; 1/4 cup mixed berries
recipe: For Greek yogurt parfait: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and mixed berries in a glass or bowl. Repeat layers as desired.

name: Roasted Chickpeas
ingredients: 1 cup cooked chickpeas, drained and rinsed; 1 tablespoon olive oil; 1/2 teaspoon cumin; 1/2 teaspoon paprika; Salt, to taste
recipe: For roasted chickpeas: Toss chickpeas with olive oil, cumin, paprika, and salt. Spread on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and roast at 400°F (200°C) for 25-30 minutes until crispy.

name: Caprese Skewers
ingredients: 12 cherry tomatoes; 12 small mozzarella balls; 12 fresh basil leaves; Balsamic glaze
recipe: For Caprese skewers: Thread cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and fresh basil leaves onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Mango Salsa with Cucumber Slices
ingredients: 1 ripe mango, diced; 1/4 cup diced red onion; 1/4 cup chopped cilantro; Juice of 1 lime; 1 cucumber, sliced
recipe: For mango salsa with cucumber slices: Mix diced mango, diced red onion, chopped cilantro, and lime juice in a bowl. Serve with cucumber slices for dipping.

name: Turkey Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 4 large lettuce leaves; 1/2 cup cooked ground turkey; 1/4 cup diced tomatoes; 1/4 cup diced bell pepper; 2 tablespoons salsa
recipe: For turkey lettuce wraps: Fill lettuce leaves with cooked ground turkey, diced tomatoes, diced bell pepper, and salsa. Roll up and serve.

name: Rice Cake with Almond Butter and Banana
ingredients: 1 rice cake; 1 tablespoon almond butter; 1/2 banana, sliced
recipe: For rice cake with almond butter and banana: Spread almond butter on a rice cake and top with sliced banana for a quick and satisfying snack.

name: Stuffed Mini Peppers
ingredients: 6 mini bell peppers; 1/4 cup hummus; 2 tablespoons crumbled feta cheese; 1 tablespoon chopped parsley
recipe: For stuffed mini peppers: Cut mini bell peppers in half lengthwise and remove seeds. Fill each pepper half with hummus and top with crumbled feta cheese and chopped parsley.

name: Banana Almond Energy Balls
ingredients: 1 ripe banana, mashed; 1/2 cup rolled oats; 1/4 cup almond butter; 2 tablespoons honey; 1/4 cup chopped almonds
recipe: For banana almond energy balls: Mix mashed banana, rolled oats, almond butter, honey, and chopped almonds in a bowl. Roll into balls and refrigerate until firm.

name: Tomato Basil Mozzarella Skewers
ingredients: 12 cherry tomatoes; 12 mini mozzarella balls; 12 fresh basil leaves; Balsamic glaze
recipe: For tomato basil mozzarella skewers: Thread cherry tomatoes, mini mozzarella balls, and fresh basil leaves onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

name: Cottage Cheese Stuffed Celery
ingredients: 4 celery stalks; 1/2 cup low-fat cottage cheese; 1/4 teaspoon paprika
recipe: For cottage cheese stuffed celery: Fill celery stalks with low-fat cottage cheese and sprinkle with paprika for extra flavor.

name: Bell Pepper Hummus Boats
ingredients: 2 bell peppers; 1/2 cup hummus; 2 tablespoons sliced olives; 1 tablespoon chopped parsley
recipe: For bell pepper hummus boats: Cut bell peppers in half lengthwise and remove seeds. Fill each pepper half with hummus and top with sliced olives and chopped parsley.

name: Avocado Cucumber Rolls
ingredients: 1 avocado, mashed; 1 cucumber, thinly sliced lengthwise; 1/4 cup shredded carrots; 2 tablespoons chopped cilantro
recipe: For avocado cucumber rolls: Spread mashed avocado on cucumber slices. Top with shredded carrots and chopped cilantro, then roll up tightly.

name: Roasted Red Pepper Dip with Pita Chips
ingredients: 1 roasted red pepper; 1/4 cup Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon lemon juice; 1 clove garlic, minced; Pita chips, for dipping
recipe: For roasted red pepper dip with pita chips: Blend roasted red pepper, Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and minced garlic until smooth. Serve with pita chips for dipping.

name: Spicy Mango Slices
ingredients: 1 ripe mango, sliced; Chili powder; Lime wedges
recipe: For spicy mango slices: Sprinkle sliced mango with chili powder and serve with lime wedges for squeezing.

name: Tuna Cucumber Bites
ingredients: 1 can (5 oz) tuna, drained; 2 tablespoons Greek yogurt; 1 tablespoon mustard; 1 cucumber, sliced; Dill sprigs
recipe: For tuna cucumber bites: Mix tuna, Greek yogurt, and mustard in a bowl. Spoon mixture onto cucumber slices and garnish with dill sprigs.

name: Watermelon Feta Skewers
ingredients: 2 cups cubed watermelon; 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese; Fresh mint leaves; Balsamic glaze
recipe: For watermelon feta skewers: Thread cubed watermelon and crumbled feta cheese onto skewers. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and drizzle with balsamic glaze.

name: Almond Date Energy Balls
ingredients: 1 cup pitted dates; 1/2 cup almonds; 2 tablespoons unsweetened shredded coconut; 1 tablespoon cocoa powder
recipe: For almond date energy balls: Blend pitted dates, almonds, shredded coconut, and cocoa powder in a food processor until mixture sticks together. Roll into balls and refrigerate until firm.

name: Cucumber Dill Yogurt Dip with Radish Slices
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt; 1/2 cucumber, grated; 1 tablespoon chopped dill; Salt and pepper, to taste; Radish slices
recipe: For cucumber dill yogurt dip with radish slices: Mix Greek yogurt, grated cucumber, chopped dill, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Serve with radish slices for dipping.

name: Pistachio Cranberry Oat Bars
ingredients: 1 cup rolled oats; 1/4 cup pistachios, chopped; 1/4 cup dried cranberries; 2 tablespoons honey; 2 tablespoons almond butter
recipe: For pistachio cranberry oat bars: Mix rolled oats, chopped pistachios, dried cranberries, honey, and almond butter in a bowl. Press mixture into a lined baking dish and refrigerate until firm. Cut into bars before serving.

name: Sweet Potato Chips
ingredients: 1 sweet potato, thinly sliced; 1 tablespoon olive oil; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For sweet potato chips: Toss sweet potato slices with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Arrange in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20-25 minutes until crispy.

name: Mango Yogurt Popsicles
ingredients: 1 cup diced mango; 1 cup Greek yogurt; 2 tablespoons honey
recipe: For mango yogurt popsicles: Blend diced mango, Greek yogurt, and honey until smooth. Pour mixture into popsicle molds and freeze until solid.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Bites
ingredients: 2 cups steamed broccoli, mashed; 1/2 cup shredded cheddar cheese; 1/4 cup breadcrumbs; 1 egg; Salt and pepper, to taste
recipe: For broccoli cheddar bites: Mix mashed steamed broccoli, shredded cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, egg, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Form mixture into bite-sized balls and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes until golden brown.

name: Peach Basil Bruschetta
ingredients: 2 ripe peaches, diced; 1/4 cup chopped fresh basil; 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze; Sliced baguette
recipe: For peach basil bruschetta: Mix diced peaches, chopped fresh basil, and balsamic glaze in a bowl. Spoon mixture onto sliced baguette and serve as an appetizer.
